text: Vancouver Linux Users Group とかに、Self employed の人がいると聞けるのにね。

attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/ujm|@ujm>: How can you write-off (expense) e-books, as a self employed business owner in Canada? Is it office supply, or capital cost allowance?
I've been searching over a year, but I found nothing. Every web page mentions only about irrelevant things like logbooks and how to publish books.
attachments.text:

I've been searching over a year, but I found nothing. Every web page mentions only about irrelevant things like logbooks and how to publish books.

text: うちは新聞図書費で費用に入ってるな。ただ電子書籍は買ってないか。基本紙。
ほんとは本買いまくりたい
